page.title: 19Growing on the River Otter
page.content: {The Salt Marsh }The salt marsh is one of the most exciting parts of the River Otter.The plants must be very special because they can live under the water,without water or with just a bit of water. {Wild Flowers }There are many colourful plants and flowers on the river bank.There is one called the Yellow Flag.It looks like a daffodil but its petals are drooped down like it is dead.There are two kinds of clover.One is white and the other is red.The far side of the river bank is covered in trees and bushes. {Farming }On the Cricket Field side of the river there are potato fields and in the next field there is rough grazing with nothing in it.On all the other fields are cattle.Some of the fields have drainage ditches running down.
